tool_description: An API for generating English sentences for a given input.
name: Linguatools Sentence Generating
title: Linguatools Sentence Generating

api_list.name: realise
api_list.description: The API can realise simple sentences given a subject, a verb and an object. Optional additional parameters allow to specify features like tense, number, voice, sentence type.

required_parameters.name: verb
required_parameters.description: any verb, including phrasal verbs like „start out“

required_parameters.name: object
required_parameters.description: any noun or pronoun. If the object is a pronoun set objdet=- and use the base form of the pronoun (e.g. she instead of her). Possible base forms are: I, you, he, she, it, we, they. This will be automatically replaced by me, you, him, her, it, us, them. Set objnum=plural to get the plural forms (e. g. object=he and objdet=- and objnum=plural yields them).

optional_parameters.name: subjdet
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the subject’s number (a, the, –). Default is „the“. Use subjdet=- to generate a subject without determiner.

optional_parameters.name: subjnum
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the subject’s number (singular, plural). A value of plural is overridden by subjdet=a.

optional_parameters.name: objdet
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the object’s determiner (a, the, –). Default is „a“. Use objdet=- to generate an object without determiner.

optional_parameters.name: objnum
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the object’s number (singular, plural). Default is singular. A value of plural is overridden by objdet=a.

optional_parameters.name: objmod
optional_parameters.description: Specifies an adjective modifying the object: any adjective

optional_parameters.name: sentencetype
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the sentence type (yesno, whatobj, whosubj). Default is a declarative sentence. &sentencetype=yesno generates a yes/no-question, whatobj generates a WH-question for the object, whosubj generates a WH-question for the subject

optional_parameters.name: tense
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the verb’s tense (present, past, future). Default is „present“

optional_parameters.name: passive
optional_parameters.description: &passive=passive generates a sentence in passive voice. The object is set as subject and the subject becomes the by-object.

optional_parameters.name: modal
optional_parameters.description: Specifies a modal verb modifying the verb (can, may, must, ought, shall, should, would). Only allowed for present tense. If tense=past or tense=future is set then the parameter modal will be ignored.
